result.content:
[quote]——新活动开幕——[/quote]


[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-btr8KxT3cSn6-kl.webp.medium.jpg[/img]
“……在这次任务中最重要的……”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-bqmhK17T3cSod-i9.webp.medium.jpg[/img]
“是[小巧的体型]。”
“请你去召集身高不到140cm的炽天使队员。”
“……哦，对了，31O丰川、也会跟你们一起行动。”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-5f79K1fT3cSxs-kr.webp.medium.jpg[/img]
“我、我只是……只是还在长个子而已——！”
“而且为什么丰川也在啊！？”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-8wncK8ToS4y-8c.webp[/img]
“这个……呃，嗯，说来话长……”

[quote]——可以参加作战的——[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-fiomK13T3cS14e-ji.webp.medium.jpg[/img]
[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-6sbqKtT3cSzj-jq.webp.medium.jpg[/img]

“这临时部队的成员，都太有个性了吧……”
“我、我真的能把她们拧成一股绳么……而且。”

[quote]——只限身高未满140cm的队员！？——[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-azb5K7ToS4b-8c.webp[/img]
“丸山同学，我们一起加油吧！”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-342dKhToS6o-8c.webp[/img]
“——比我更适合当队长的家伙出现了——！！”

[quote]——U140 with 31O、参战！——[/quote]

author.signature:
正在更新的安科：
[url=https://ngabbs.com/read.php?tid=41989465]​[安科/安价] [同人] [MYGO][HBR/炽焰天穹]丰川祥子、为了人类的未来而战……真的能战吗？[/url]

视频化第一集点此↓
[url=https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1PQ9iYpE46]丰川祥子、为了人类的未来而战……真的能战吗？#1[/url]
+白色咒文 ...
[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202504/08/lsQ2v-bgidXxT3cS1ao-qq.png[/img]

result.content:
[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-342dKhToS6o-8c.webp[/img]
“说到底为什么你们对丰川变小了的事情完全不在意啊！？”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-78tjKgToS64-8c.webp[/img]
“啊，那是因为吾就是罪魁祸首。”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-94hpKbToS4e-8c.webp[/img]
“是这样么！？”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/10/lsQ2w-4stsKjToS6e-8c.webp[/img]
“因为，丰川同学就算变小了、也还是很可靠。”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/10/lsQ2w-eczxKjToS6o-8c.webp[/img]
“呵呵……无论如何，她都是我的弟子呢。”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-ke5oKeToS43-8c.webp[/img]
“跟我没关系——”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-342dKhToS6o-8c.webp[/img]
“——结果大惊小怪的只有我一个人么！？”

[quote]——闹闹腾腾的小个子部队、出发探查废弃的研究所！——[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-e3s4KkT3cS142-im.webp.medium.jpg[/img]

“这里，似乎曾经研究过[什么]。”

“……总觉得，我[来过]这里……”

[quote]——与丰川祥子有关的秘密、在不可思议的地方揭露！？——[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-cq37KhToS66-8c.webp[/img]
“嚯，密码锁么。”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/09/lsQ2w-do9nKhToS6f-8c.webp[/img]
“这里就交给人家的说！”
“人家现在已经可以数到十以上了的说！”

[quote]*滴滴*[/quote][quote]*急促的警报声*
[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-j8hxKaToS8c-8c.webp[/img]
“丰后——！！！”

[quote]——孩子们、大危机！？——[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-kmsfK8ToS4f-8c.webp[/img]
“……呐，丸山同学。”
“你是丸山家族的千金，对吧。”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-7dlcKeToS5e-8c.webp[/img]
“……！”
“终于来了么……我一直在等着你，丰川家的。”

[quote]……没有柳在身边的我，真的能做到吗……！[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-4kfoK8ToS4f-8c.webp[/img]
“嗯。”
“我有个问题想问你。”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-7dlcKeToS5e-8c.webp[/img]
“啊啊，问吧。”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-azb5K7ToS4b-8c.webp[/img]
“——你认识丸山彩小姐么？”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-342dKhToS6o-8c.webp[/img]
“为什么啊——！？”

[quote]——不可思议的变化、不可思议的遭遇！——
——萝莉控最喜欢的一集！——[/quote][quote]
[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-gvqyKxT1kSfs-8x.webp[/img]
——大型活动《冲呀！小个子大作战U140》、准备开幕！——
[/quote]

视频化第一集点此↓

result.content:
[quote]——新活动开幕——[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-g8b2K4ToS3t-3m.webp[/img]
“到底是谁……”
“用[简易长筷子]杀死小希的，到底是谁！？”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-5i1tK4T8S36-3m.webp[/img]
“不，所以说我还没死啊。”




[quote]——被囚禁在拉文克劳宿舍(并没有)的少女们——[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-29bpK3ToS54-3m.webp[/img]
“库库库……”
“我宣布，魔女裁判、正式开始！”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-ebcnK4ToS3v-3m.webp[/img]
“不，咱们是女巫、不是魔女啊。”

[quote]——卷入了黑暗至极的魔女审判！？——[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-8hu5K5ToS4c-3m.webp[/img]
“我……我果然还是无法相信！”
“我们之中居然还会有杀人魔什么的……”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-2896K3ToS4d-3m.webp[/img]
“是呢。”
“我也不敢相信……”

[quote]——凶手、到底会是谁！？——[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-fh7uK4T8S3h-3m.webp[/img]
“……很遗憾。”
“现在的一切证据，都指向了你——小希！”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-jiohK3T8S2o-3m.webp[/img]
“我刚刚不是死者担当吗。”

[quote]——堪称硬核烧脑推理大作级别的反转！？——[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-dt6nK3T8S39-3m.webp[/img]
“那我知道了，凶手是惠惠，因为她会飞。”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-imh3K4T8S3l-3m.webp[/img]
“不，咱们全都会飞吧。”

[quote]——令人瞠目结舌的犯案手法与诡计！——[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-fh7uK4T8S3h-3m.webp[/img]
“……那就是小祥干的。”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-5i1tK4T8S36-3m.webp[/img]
“别穷举啊。”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-32tpK3ToS5k-5k.webp[/img]
“怎、怎么可能是祥子干的呢！”
“她、她只是一只弱小可怜又无助的小猫咪啊！”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-apchK2ToS6k-6k.webp[/img]
“……抱歉，爱音。”
“因为，我的肚子饿了……”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-z7jK4ToS42-46.webp[/img]
“咿呀啊啊啊——！”
“我的布丁——！杀害布丁的凶手找到惹——！”
“好过分！好残忍！你哪儿还算是人——！”


[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-ebcnK4ToS3v-3m.webp[/img]
“不，她现在确实是猫啦。”

[quote]——爱与恨的螺旋、无止境的仇恨循环！——[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-fwzxK3ToS5k-5k.webp[/img]
“是我的错觉么，总觉得拉文克劳那边好吵噢。”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-1r1kK2ToS5k-5k.webp[/img]
“……还是别理她们比较好。”

[quote]——背弃的友谊、残酷的剪切线！——
——少女们的未来将会何去何从！？——[/quote][quote]
[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-6lqyZcT3cS15w-nc.webp.medium.jpg[/img]
——HBRGOxHPGO联动特典活动·《魔法女巫的神人审判》、即将开幕——
[/quote] 注：不一定会写，因为没去要授权.jpg

result.content:
[quote]此外的备选活动还有……[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/10/lsQ2w-7odpKdToS4e-8c.webp[/img]
“OK，决定了！”
“这次就由Miss Kunimi来扮演Miss Chihaya的幼年期~！”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-en00KfToS5u-8c.webp[/img]
“诶，我吗？”

[quote]——电影活动第三部！[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-8127K8ToS43-46.webp[/img]
“啊，辛苦了，覆地之手前辈。”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-b0wsK7ToS46-46.webp[/img]
“不，哪里哪里，你才是辛苦了呢，猩红之主君。”

[quote]——如果大伙儿只是在演一部叫作《HBRGO》的电视剧！？[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-7snKfT8S3m-8c.webp[/img]
“……大家，都不用准备中考吗？”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-gtrzKdT8S3d-8c.webp[/img]
“啊这。”

[quote]——如果说31A和平解散的话……？[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-ejszKcToS53-8c.webp[/img]
“我得到，神奇星癌体了！”

[img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-3jmrKcToS5v-8c.webp[/img]
“这又是什么世界观……”

[quote]——来自炽天使部队的爱音，决定成为星可梦大师！？[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-771wKrT3cShu-k7.webp.medium.jpg[/img]
“这是……泳装？”
“诶，为什么我会……”

[quote]——还有泳装二期的事！？[/quote][img]https://img.nga.178.com/attachments/mon_202509/11/lsQ2w-4f0hK7ToS68-8c.webp[/img]
“你们知道吗，其实丰川祥子和千早爱音有个女儿叫国见玉……”

[quote]——重生之我是喵梦之我是野史大王！？[/quote][quote]一切的一切，尽在HBRGO第三章……

以上内容除了夏洛和U140活动以外纯属胡扯，请以实物为准.jpg[/quote]大伙有什么想看的特典可以说一下，我看着来(
